name: BatterySharks.com
tag_list: sla-batteries, ups-batteries, rbc-models, electric-scooter-batteries, alkalines, emergency-ballast, wheelchair-batteries, battry-chargers, electric-fence-batteries, medica-batteries
overview:
Battery Sharks - One of the leading on-line stores for quality batteries. Batterysharks sells full line of brand new sealed lead acid, nicad, alkaline, lithium, and nimh batteries at discount prices. We strive to deliver the best quality and factory fresh batteries to the masses. Batterysharks NEVER stores credit card information. The site also uses 128 bit SSL encryption when accepting online orders. Your identity and security is VERY important to us and we do not share any information with a 3rd party. We do not charge more than the true UPS shipping rate. We do not charge any hidden shipping or handling charge. If you compare our prices with other competitors online, we still come out cheaper than them. No “FREE SHIIPPING” tricks and hidden costs. You pay the true wholesale battery price plus the true shipping cost.

Orders are processed within 24 hours 7 days a week. Expect your package within 1-5 business days. All of our shipments have tracking numbers that you can access online in your account area.
